about_the_game:
This DLC contains:
- Captain James Flint -3D print file
-- STL file for Captain James Flint figurine
-- The unpainted figurine is 18 cm tall. Printing the figurine requires a 3D printer
- Digital soundtrack (composed by Winifred Phillips)
- Dioramas (x5) Each diorama depicts a scene from one of the game’s chapters
- Digital artbook
- Character sheets (x5) Learn more about the main characters of Flint: Treasure of Oblivion with these character sheets
detailed_description:
This DLC contains:
- Captain James Flint -3D print file
-- STL file for Captain James Flint figurine
-- The unpainted figurine is 18 cm tall. Printing the figurine requires a 3D printer
- Digital soundtrack (composed by Winifred Phillips)
- Dioramas (x5) Each diorama depicts a scene from one of the game’s chapters
- Digital artbook
- Character sheets (x5) Learn more about the main characters of Flint: Treasure of Oblivion with these character sheets
